questions.question: Why is employee confidentiality important in HR management?

It increases profits directly
It replaces performance reviews
It reduces training needs
questions.correctAnswer: It protects personal data

Long-term managers
Interns only
Employees resistant to change

Team recruiting
Onboarding

Temporary hiring

Reduces payroll costs directly
Eliminates HR duties

To eliminate feedback

Paid vacation
Gym membership

Unemployment insurance
Retirement savings

Increases training needs
Eliminates HR responsibilities

Mandatory bonus for all employees
